original_text: together with the towns that were set apart for the people of Ephraim within the inheritance of the Manassites, all those towns with their villages.
korean_text: 그 외에 므낫세 자손의 기업 중에서 에브라임 자손을 위하여 구분한 모든 성읍과 그 마을들도 있었더라

sentences.original_text: that were set apart for the people of Ephraim
within the inheritance of the Manassites
all those towns with their villages
